mapper.update: update sms_marketing set del_flag = '1' where id = #{id} and store_id = #{storeId}

update sms_marketing set name = #{name} , `desc` = #{desc},
cate_id = #{cateId} ,
starttime = #{startTime} ,
endtime = #{endTime} where id = #{id} and store_id=#{storeId}

mapper.select: select sms_marketing.* from sms_marketing join pms_sku_marketing on sms_marketing.id = pms_sku_marketing.marketing_id where (sms_marketing.type='5' or sms_marketing.type = '4'or sms_marketing.type = '2') and sms_marketing.starttime <= now() and sms_marketing.endtime > now() and pms_sku_marketing.skuId=#{skuId} limit 1

select sms_marketing.*, pms_sku_marketing.skuId as skuid from sms_marketing join pms_sku_marketing on sms_marketing.id = pms_sku_marketing.marketing_id where sms_marketing.endtime > now() and pms_sku_marketing.skuId=#{skuId} AND type ='3' order by id limit 1
select * from sms_marketing lm join sms_marketing_try lmt on lm.id=lmt.marketing_id where lmt.has_audit ='0' and lm.del_flag='0' and lm.endtime < now() and lm.type='9'

select count(1) from sms_marketing lm join sms_marketing_crowdfunding lms on lm.id=lms.marketing_id where
!(lm.endtime <#{startTime} || lm.starttime >#{endTime})
lm.endtime >=now()
and lms.spu_id=#{spuId} and lm.type ='11' and lm.del_flag='0'
and lm.id !=#{id}
SELECT lm.* FROM sms_marketing lm JOIN sms_marketing_crowdfunding lmc on lm.id=lmc.marketing_id WHERE lm. lmc.auto_handle_status='0' and lm.endtime < now() order by lm.id desc
